org.jasig.portlet.courses.degreeprogress.model

Class CreditsRequirement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.portlet.courses.degreeprogress.model.CreditsRequirement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDegreeRequirement, IGeneralDegreeRequirement

    public class CreditsRequirement
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGeneralDegreeRequirement
    Holds the amount of the user's current credits towards an area of study and the amount of credits required for that area.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0, 2012-02-07
    Author:
    Aaron Grant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double currentCredits
      The amount of credits a user currently has in an area of study
      private double requiredCredits
      The amount of credits that are required of a user in an area of study

    • Method Detail

      • isCompleted

        public boolean isCompleted()
        Confirms whether or not the user has met the credit requirement in an area of study.
        Specified by:
        isCompleted in interface IDegreeRequirement
        Returns:
        true if the current amount of credits is greater or equal to the required amount of credits; false otherwise
